long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds the elapsed pace to an activity detail page. This is the pace based on elapsed time rather than moving time. It currently works for running and hiking, and does not work for cycling.

Known bugs:
This does not currently work for activities less than 1 minute in duration.
